description: Academy City`s researcher. She was in charge of the "Level 6 Shift" project. Even after the project was put to a stop, she kept herself in the laboratory, creating a vaccine for the virus program that Ao Amai put in Last Order. She is shot by Amai while trying to protect Accelerator and Last Order but recovers and is later released from the hospital along with Accelerator and Last Order.
name: Yoshikawa Kikyou
